00020 #ifndef BRICS_3D_ROSNORMAL3D_H_

00040 template <typename PointT> inline void
00041   computePointNormal (PointCloud3D* cloud,
00042                       Eigen::Vector4d &plane_parameters, double &curvature)
00043 {
00044   if (cloud->getSize()== 0)
00045   {
00046     plane_parameters.setConstant (std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ());
00047     curvature = std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ();
00048     return;
00049   }
00050 
00051   // Placeholder for the 3x3 covariance matrix at each surface patch
00052     EIGEN_ALIGN_MEMORY Eigen::Matrix3d covariance_matrix;
00053     // 16-bytes aligned placeholder for the XYZ centroid of a surface patch
00054     Eigen::Vector4d xyz_centroid;
00055 
00056   // Estimate the XYZ centroid
00057   compute3DCentroid (cloud, xyz_centroid);
00058 
00059   // Compute the 3x3 covariance matrix
00060   computeCovarianceMatrix (cloud, xyz_centroid, covariance_matrix);
00061 
00062   // Get the plane normal and surface curvature
00063   solvePlaneParameters (covariance_matrix, xyz_centroid, plane_parameters, curvature);
00064 }
00065 
00067 
00077 inline void
00078   computePointNormal (PointCloud3D* cloud, const std::vector<int> *indices,
00079                       Eigen::Vector4d &plane_parameters, double &curvature)
00080 {
00081   if (indices->size () == 0)
00082   {
00083     plane_parameters.setConstant (std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ());
00084     curvature = std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ();
00085     return;
00086   }
00087 
00088   // Placeholder for the 3x3 covariance matrix at each surface patch
00089   EIGEN_ALIGN_MEMORY Eigen::Matrix3d covariance_matrix;
00090     // 16-bytes aligned placeholder for the XYZ centroid of a surface patch
00091     Eigen::Vector4d xyz_centroid;
00092 
00093   // Estimate the XYZ centroid
00094   compute3DCentroid (cloud, *indices, xyz_centroid);
00095 
00096   // Compute the 3x3 covariance matrix
00097   computeCovarianceMatrix (cloud, *indices, xyz_centroid, covariance_matrix);
00098 
00099   // Get the plane normal and surface curvature
00100   solvePlaneParameters (covariance_matrix, xyz_centroid, plane_parameters, curvature);
00101 }

00115 inline void
00116   computePointNormal (PointCloud3D* cloud, const std::vector<int> &indices,
00117                       Eigen::Vector4d &plane_parameters, double &curvature)
00118 {
00119   if (indices.size () == 0)
00120   {
00121     plane_parameters.setConstant (std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ());
00122     curvature = std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ();
00123     return;
00124   }
00125 
00126   // Placeholder for the 3x3 covariance matrix at each surface patch
00127         EIGEN_ALIGN_MEMORY Eigen::Matrix3d covariance_matrix;
00128     // 16-bytes aligned placeholder for the XYZ centroid of a surface patch
00129     Eigen::Vector4d xyz_centroid;
00130 
00131   // Estimate the XYZ centroid
00132   compute3DCentroid (cloud, indices, xyz_centroid);
00133 
00134   // Compute the 3x3 covariance matrix

00154 inline void
00155   computePointNormal (PointCloud3D *cloud, const std::vector<int> &indices,
00156                       double &nx, double &ny, double &nz, double &curvature)
00157 {
00158   if (indices.size () == 0)
00159   {
00160     nx = ny = nz = curvature = std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN ();
00161     return;
00162   }
00163 
00164   // Placeholder for the 3x3 covariance matrix at each surface patch
00165         EIGEN_ALIGN_MEMORY Eigen::Matrix3d covariance_matrix;
00166      // 16-bytes aligned placeholder for the XYZ centroid of a surface patch
00167      Eigen::Vector4d xyz_centroid;
00168 
00169 
00170   // Estimate the XYZ centroid
00171   compute3DCentroid (cloud, indices, xyz_centroid);
00172 
00173   // Compute the 3x3 covariance matrix
00174   computeCovarianceMatrix (cloud, indices, xyz_centroid, covariance_matrix);
00175 
00176   // Get the plane normal and surface curvature
00177   solvePlaneParameters (covariance_matrix, nx, ny, nz, curvature);
00178 }
